Text: MANY THANKS FOR THIS TORRENT. I LOVE CAST. I WAS WONDERING WOULD YOU BE ABLE TO UPLOAD THE ALBUMS - MOTHER NATURE CALLS, MAGIC HOUR AND BEETROOT PLEASE? I HAVE THEM ON CD BUT WANT THEM ON MY IPOD. THANKS AGAIN AND LONG LIVE THE PIRATE BAY!!!
REMEMBER EVERYONE - SEED UNTIL YOUR SHARE RATIO IS AT LEAST 1:1. THAT WAY THE TORRENT WILL NEVER DIE! LONG LIVE THE PIRATE BAY!!
